mapper.select: SELECT id, "name", quantity, price, created_by, last_modified_by, updated_time, create_time FROM public.todo
select SUM(case when status = 'paid' then amount else 0 end) as "paid", SUM(case when status = 'pending' then amount else 0 end) as "pending" from invoices;
select i.amount, c.name, c.image_url, c.email, i.id, i.date from invoices i join customers c on i.customer_id = c.u_id order by i.date desc limit 5;
